item.title: My client freezes when i click on lunar altar?
item.dc:creator: @Int_Bauk Int Bauk
item.description:
@Int_Bauk wrote:

Your getting a thread 5 error I believe so, use the constructLunar(); method underneath your configureLunar(atextdrawingarea); method.

Read full topic

item.title: My client freezes when i click on lunar altar?
item.dc:creator: @I_Roll_Deep I Roll Deep
item.description:
@I_Roll_Deep wrote:

[quote=“kleber883, post:4, topic:413687”]My friend was hosting a server and that happened a lot. From what he told me it’s client sided.
Are you running a 317? And what client are you using??[/quote]
check the case for your lunar altar, there might be a interface, sidebarinterface id or something that doesnt exist, check it.

it doesnt say anything i click on the altar. its fine. Then when i go to click on the spell book to get the lunar it freezes and says nothing on the clientmanager thing.

item.title: My client freezes when i click on lunar altar?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

There should be an error that pops up in your client cmd window. Post it here.

Most likely it’s trying to switch to the lunar magic interface - do you have it?
